name: Monday Office Demo
description:
Monday Office Demo

This is a demo for my "trolling" game.

You just need to walk and the game will take care of the rest. You have some doors you can open, but don't expect to enter a room and just pick up just a few objects and inspect them to see how well i can model in 3D.

At first you will notice a "TV" on the wall. In the final game you will be guided by those TV's placed around the map, the rest is up to you to explore. As i mentioned this is not just an exploration game. You can't lose, but you can't win either. 

It is just a game to have fun with.

Have a good one.
